hero.role: Data Analyst | Specializing in Cloud & Machine Learning (AWS)

about.title: About Me
about.description: With a Bachelor's degree in Physical Sciences, my training exposed me to the challenge of managing large-scale databases at <1>CIEASEST</1>, which gave me a solid foundation in analysis and automation. To overcome the limitations of local infrastructure, I now specialize in AWS to design and deploy robust data pipelines in the cloud. My goal is clear: for this infrastructure to feed future AI models and agents to build systems that act in real-time on innovative solutions.

education.title: Education
education.summary: Acquired a solid foundation in <1>programming</1>, <3>analysis</3>, and <5>research</5>.
education.achievement1: Winner of the UNICA 2023 Scientific Research Award, Thesis researcher for the <1>Early Warning System for Dust Storms</1> project, funded with USD 16,000
education.achievement2: Volunteer at the MUTSUNICA Astronomy Group & Student candidate for the university assembly
education.achievement3: Top Third of the class, ranking 2nd in the graduating class
